Title: Relates to rates of tax for personal income in the city of New York
Summary: Relates to rates of tax for personal income in the city of New York; provides personal income tax rates for city taxable income between $500,000 and $100,000,000.
LawCode: Amd ยง1304, Tax L; amd ยง11-1701, NYC Ad Cd
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law and the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to rates of tax for personal income in the city of New York
